name: Griddie Islands
description:
Welcome to the world of Griddies!

A world where tiny islands are inhabited by even tinier fleas and quirky beings called Griddies!

Place griddies on the islands and watch as the fleas start to jump around in excitement and produce money! Use it to buy more griddies to attract more fleas.

Same-level Griddies can also be merged into higher level ones, and the higher the level the more they produce! Merge every Griddie to discover the 50+ levels, each with its own look and personality.

Merge, level up, and try to keep the islands filled in this lively idle merger!
